pullrequest.title: Time penalties on skip and reset

content.raw: Found a bug when completing a checkpoint quickly after the previous one. The checkpoint duration ends up being the absolute sim time instead of the difference from the chackpoint's start time. Taking a look now.
content.html: Found a bug when completing a checkpoint quickly after the previous one. The checkpoint duration ends up being the absolute sim time instead of the difference from the chackpoint's start time. Taking a look now.
